channel.title: Quests!
channel.description:
I was wondering how can i make a quest? elements required: -first of all making the quest red not green (incomplete) -talking to a guy (have conversation) -he teleports you when ready -you exchange item for reward at end
If any one could help i would be very grateful!!!!!!

item.title: Quests!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning [b]you must help yourselves before requesting help[/b]. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

1 - Base?
2 - Revision? (317, 508, etc)
3 - What did you try, what failed and what worked?

Read full topic
